text: 24 Tower Hamlets Local Plan BACK TO CONTENTS the historic docklands, east of the City of London. One Canada Square is a symbol of modern, progressive London and forms the backdrop to the dramatic skyline of Canary Wharf, which is visible over a wide area and globally recognised as an iconic London landmark. 8.24 Large parts of the borough, predominantly towards the Isle of Dogs, Lower Lea Valley, Olympic Legacy and City Fringe areas have undergone significant change and regeneration within our inner-city communities. In recent years there has been an increase in the number of tall buildings, causing notable changes to the boroughâ€™s skyline. For a number of years, Tower Hamlets has had the largest pipeline of tall buildings of any local authority area in the United Kingdom (including consented and proposed developments).
